name: Marij Maryam
title: Web Developer & BSBA Student
summary: I am a passionate web developer and BSBA student with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. My journey in web development began with a curiosity about how websites work, which quickly evolved into a deep passion for creating digital experiences. Currently pursuing my Bachelor of Business Administration, I combine academic learning with hands-on project experience to build my skills and create meaningful web solutions.
